text: Cartoon Planet is a short lived spin-off of the Adult Swim program Space Ghost Coast to Coast. The show ran from 1995 to 1998. The show has random skits and songs with the characters Space Ghost, Zorak, and Brak. Zorak and Brak are comic foils for Space Ghost. Moltar, a main character on Coast to Coast, does not appear on the show. In the credits everyone is credited by their first name only. The show has not been released on DVD, because of rights issues other than some segments being extras on The Brak Show Volume One. The show revived on Adult Swim briefly in 2005. ==Cast== * Andy Merrill as Brak * George Lowe as Space Ghost * C. Martin Croker as Zorak Category:Adult Swim Category:Television spin-offs Category:English-language television programs
title: Cartoon Planet
